backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining data types (Song, VoiceSample, VoicePersona, Cover, LyricsRequest) and public functions for uploading songs/voice samples, creating personas/covers, and submitting lyrics requests with optional stylePrompt field.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old LyricsRequest records (without stylePrompt) to new LyricsRequest records (with optional stylePrompt field set to null).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: adding a style prompt text input field, displaying clickable style keyword suggestions, and submitting the style prompt to the backend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and configuration files describing the application's UI structure, voice recording/upload, song processing workflows, and library management.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm orange-to-red gradient palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the AI Voice Cover App.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing multi-view navigation (create/library/personas), workflow state (cover/generation modes), step progression, and persona-first workflow with automatic Library navigation after processing completes.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Audio player component with play/pause controls, seek slider, volume control, time display, and song metadata display using the useAudioPlayer hook.
frontend/src/components/DownloadButton.t: A React component that downloads an audio file (MP3 or WAV) from an ExternalBlob, handling MIME types, filename extensions, and showing loading/success states with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/FormatSelector.t: A radio group component that allows users to select between MP3 (compressed) and WAV (uncompressed) audio download formats with visual labels and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/GenerationMode.t: A multi-step form component for generating songs from lyrics, including optional style prompt input with keyword suggestions and lyrics submission that calls the backend actor's submitLyricsRequest method.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main application layout component with header, navigation tabs (Create/Library/Personas), background styling with waveform image, and GitHub link.
frontend/src/components/Library.tsx: Displays a user's song library with play/pause controls, format selection, download functionality, and social sharing options using an audio player hook and query for fetching songs.
frontend/src/components/LyricsInput.tsx: A textarea component for entering song lyrics with character count validation (20-2000 chars), placeholder text, and a submit button that triggers song generation.
frontend/src/components/ModeSelector.tsx: A landing page component with two clickable cards that let users choose between 'Cover a Song' mode (upload existing audio) or 'Generate from Lyrics' mode (create from text).
frontend/src/components/Personas.tsx: Manages voice personas with create, delete, and select functionality. Displays a list of user voice personas with options to record/upload voice samples and associate them with named personas.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingStatus: Displays multi-stage processing progress for both cover creation and song generation workflows. Shows animated progress bars and stage-by-stage status updates with completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/SocialShare.tsx: Provides social media sharing functionality for songs via dropdown menu. Supports Facebook sharing and YouTube upload through dedicated dialogs.
frontend/src/components/SongUpload.tsx: Handles song file upload with metadata input (title, artist) and progress tracking. Validates audio file types (MP3, WAV, M4A) and size limits before uploading to backend.
frontend/src/components/StyleKeywords.ts: Displays clickable badge keywords for music style suggestions (genres, effects, tempo). Provides predefined options like '808', 'Auto-Tune', 'trap', 'R&B', etc. to help users describe desired sound.
frontend/src/components/VoiceInput.tsx: Wrapper component providing toggle between voice recording and file upload modes. Renders either VoiceRecorder or VoiceUpload based on user selection.
frontend/src/components/VoiceRecorder.ts: Implements voice recording with real-time audio level visualization and duration display. Handles microphone access, recording controls, and uploads recorded audio as voice sample to backend.
frontend/src/components/VoiceUpload.tsx: React component for uploading voice samples with file validation (MP3/WAV/M4A, max 50MB), progress tracking, and integration with the backend actor to store uploaded audio files.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeUploadDia: Dialog component for configuring and uploading songs to YouTube with title, description, and privacy settings; currently shows a placeholder UI flow with instructions for manual upload as OAuth2 integration is not fully implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Custom hook providing audio playback controls (play/pause, seek, volume) and state management (current time, duration, loading status) using the HTML5 Audio API.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerationStatus.t: Hook that simulates multi-stage song generation progress (analyzing, composing, synthesizing, mixing, mastering) with smooth progress updates and returns a generated cover ID upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, providing login/logout functionality, identity state, and login status tracking using the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessingStatus.t: Hook that orchestrates multi-stage audio processing with progress tracking, creates a dummy final mix, and calls the backend actor to create a cover record upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including covers, lyrics requests, user libraries, and voice personas with automatic refetching and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: Custom React hook that manages voice recording using MediaRecorder API, tracks recording duration, monitors audio levels via Web Audio API, and returns recording state and control functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color schemes using OKLCH color space, plus base body styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that extends the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH variables, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an AI voice cover app with architectural notes about free-tier requirements, voice cloning, audio processing pipeline, and tracking existing features like voice recording/upload, song upload, export, and UI theming.
